mx4j.log
Class Logger

java.lang.Object
  mx4j.log.Logger
Direct Known Subclasses:
CommonsLogger, FileLogger, Log4JLogger, LoggerBroadcaster.LoggerNotifier, MBeanLogger
public class Logger
extends java.lang.Object

Base class for logging objects.

$Revision: 1.5 $
